Title: Relates to allowances for the costs of diapers
Summary: Relates to authorizing the payment of costs, up to eighty dollars, of diapers for an eligible child two years of age or younger for children receiving safety net assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง350, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowances for the costs of diapers
